text: Gerach is a community in the Upper Franconian district of Bamberg and a member of the administrative community (Verwaltungsgemeinschaft) of Baunach. It is in the Naturpark Haßberge (nature park) about 20 km north of Bamberg and about 10 km south of Ebern. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bell peals from Gerach (Bayerischer Rundfunk) * Community’s website Category:Bamberg (district)
title: Gerach
